comment:
* Represents a resource bundle item's value.
     * Avoids object creations as much as possible.
     * Mutable, not thread-safe.
     * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

methods.name: public abstract int getType()
methods.comment:
* @return ICU resource type like {@link UResourceBundle#getType()},
         *     for example, {@link UResourceBundle#STRING}

methods.name: public abstract String getString()
methods.comment:
* @see UResourceBundle#getString()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not a string resource

methods.name: public abstract String getAliasString()
methods.comment: * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an alias resource

methods.name: public abstract int getInt()
methods.comment:
* @see UResourceBundle#getInt()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an integer resource

methods.name: public abstract int getUInt()
methods.comment:
* @see UResourceBundle#getUInt()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an integer resource

methods.name: public abstract int[] getIntVector()
methods.comment:
* @see UResourceBundle#getIntVector()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an intvector resource

methods.name: public abstract ByteBuffer getBinary()
methods.comment:
* @see UResourceBundle#getBinary()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not a binary-blob resource

methods.name: public abstract Array getArray()
methods.comment: * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an array resource

methods.name: public abstract Table getTable()
methods.comment: * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not a table resource

methods.name: public abstract boolean isNoInheritanceMarker()
methods.comment:
* Is this a no-fallback/no-inheritance marker string?
         * Such a marker is used for CLDR no-fallback data values of "∅∅∅"
         * when enumerating tables with fallback from the specific resource bundle to root.
         *
         * @return true if this is a no-inheritance marker string

methods.name: public abstract String[] getStringArray()
methods.comment:
* @return the array of strings in this array resource.
         * @see UResourceBundle#getStringArray()
         * @throws UResourceTypeMismatchException if this is not an array resource
         *     or if any of the array items is not a string

methods.name: public abstract String[] getStringArrayOrStringAsArray()
public abstract String getStringOrFirstOfArray()
